reviewText: My 82 yr old Mother loves everything about Mr. Lowry.  She has all sorts of CDs, DVDs, VHS movies, etc that have Mr. Lowry on them, usually with the Gaithers.  When I saw this VHS tape on Amazon.com, I knew I couldn't go wrong with this as her Christmas gift.  I was correct.

reviewText: This DVD is wonderful. Mark is his usual funny self but can also sing so sincerely. Enjoyed hearing him sing with his "Mama." He definitely belongs on Broadway and anywhere else that anyone needs to hear the message of Jesus in song and by word of mouth. Mark can put such a funny twist on the gospel. Love this one and I think anyone who likes Mark will love it too.

reviewText: Mark knows how to be entertaining.  He is an inspirational and loveable believer.Two of the main things that I find most striking about Mark are his lack of religiousity and his sincere realism. What a blessing he must be to all who know him.Lord willing, I will be seeing Mark in person soon. We are very much looking forward to it.Mickey Thorne

reviewText: This is one of the most remarkable videos I've ever watched. The humor is fun and I feel like this is what religion and praising God should really be all about. If you don't get goosebumps listening to their 'tenor' you are tone deaf. He is singing to the heavens, unlike the three tenors who sing for $.  A wonderful CD made for family and a reminder that we tend to think to much about our self absorbed lives. It is uplifting, rewarding and makes you rewind to watching over and over again.
summary: Not a religious, church person BUT
